context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore different funding options such as reaching out to local charities, setting up a crowdfunding campaign, or seeking assistance from government aid programs for medical needs
reach out to the pharmaceutical company that makes the medication
seek help from family, friends, and the community, and explore options such as fundraisers or crowdfunding platforms

seek assistance from various sources, which could include negotiating with the hospital or the drug company, exploring available financial assistance programs for medical costs, considering crowdfunding, or seeking help from charitable organizations
seek financial assistance from community programs, charities or pharmaceutical companies that often have programs to help people in need
explore all possible options to obtain the medication
explore different options to secure the needed funds
seek help from different sources
seek assistance from non-profit organizations, charities, or pharmaceutical assistance programs that offer help to those who are unable to afford necessary medications
explore all possible options to secure the funds for the medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for roadside assistance or a tow truck to fix his car or bring it to a repair shop
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to take him to the airport
contact a taxi service or use a ride-sharing app to get a ride to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi/ride service to continue his journey to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber or other ride sharing service to come pick him up and take him to the airport
call for road assistance or a taxi/ride share service to take him to the airport
call a taxi service or rideshare like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport
call a taxi, ride-sharing service, or a friend to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a tow truck for his car while also arranging a taxi, Uber, or similar service to continue his journey to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a tow truck to either fix his car on the spot or transport it to a repair shop

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: check the surveillance cameras if there are any, for any signs of theft or misplacement
review the sales records or CCTV footage, if available, to try and identify any errors or discrepancies that could have resulted in the missing money
check the sales receipts and compare them to the register total
retrace his steps and review the transactions to try to locate any discrepancies or mistakes
contact his supervisor or the store owner and report the missing money
notify his superiors of the missing money and do a thorough check of the cash register area and the sales records of the day
check the sales records and receipts to see if there was an error in accounting
double check and recount the money in the register to make sure there wasn't a mistake in his initial count
immediately inform his supervisor or the owner about the missing money
immediately notify the owner or his superior about the missing money

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put and try to create a visible signal for potential rescuers
stay put or find a safe and visible place to shelter
stay put and find a way to signal for help

stay where they are
